faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our pricing and plans

changePlan.question: Can I change plans at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes are applied immediately with prorated billing adjustment. If you upgrade to a higher plan, you only pay the difference for the remaining period. If you downgrade, the credit is applied to your next invoice.

hiddenFees.question: Are there any hidden fees?
hiddenFees.answer: No, our pricing is completely transparent. The displayed price is what you pay. There are no transaction fees, no hidden fees, no setup fees. Annual subscription saves you 2 months (17% discount) compared to monthly subscription.

cancel.question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period (month or year). No refund is made for already paid periods, but you retain full access until your subscription expires. You can reactivate your subscription at any time.

freeLimit.question: Does the free plan have a time limit?
freeLimit.answer: No, the free plan is available indefinitely with no time limit. You can use it for as long as you want, no credit card required. Upgrade to a paid plan only when you need additional features or higher limits.

vat.question: Do prices include VAT?
vat.answer: Displayed prices are excluding tax (HT). VAT will be added at checkout according to your geographic location. For European businesses with a valid EU VAT number, VAT is reverse-charge (you self-assess the VAT). Contact us for more information on billing for your country.

discounts.question: Do you offer discounts for startups or NGOs?
discounts.answer: Yes, we offer preferential rates for eligible startups (less than 3 years old, less than 10 employees) and recognized non-profit organizations. Discounts can go up to 50% depending on your situation. Contact our sales team with your organization details to discuss your eligibility and get a personalized quote.

trial.question: Can I try a paid plan before committing?
trial.answer: Yes, all our paid plans include a 14-day free trial. You can test all plan features without a credit card. At the end of the trial period, you can choose to continue with the plan or return to the free plan with no commitment.

payment.question: How can I pay for my subscription?
payment.answer: We accept credit card payments (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and bank transfers for annual and Enterprise subscriptions. Payments are secured via Stripe (PCI-DSS certified). For Enterprise plans, we also offer custom billing options with negotiable payment terms.
